data.name: Deel
data.description: The deel is a traditional Mongolian clothing item, usually made from silk, cotton, or wool. It has a distinctive design with a wide cut and high collar.

data.name: Tsaatan Coat
data.description: The Tsaatan coat is worn by the Tsaatan people, an ethnic group of reindeer herders. It's made from reindeer hide and provides warmth in the harsh Mongolian climate.

data.name: Khadag
data.description: The khadag is a ceremonial silk scarf used in various occasions, symbolizing respect and good wishes. It's often presented as a sign of honor and appreciation.

data.name: Zodog
data.description: The zodog is a traditional Mongolian vest, typically worn by men. It's often made from colorful fabric and can be decorated with intricate patterns.

data.name: Gutal
data.description: The gutal is a type of traditional Mongolian boots. They are durable and practical, designed to withstand the challenges of nomadic life.

data.name: Khantaaz
data.description: The khantaaz is a traditional Mongolian robe-like clothing item. It's made from silk and often worn during formal occasions.
